entry.title: The New Hale Pack
entry.summary:
Author: Romantific

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,253Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Danielle Stilinski returns to Beacon Hills after graduating from Stanford University with honours, but she has a secret.She’s a very powerful witch.Dani is just settling into her new life and getting her business up and running when she finds out that one of her oldest friends, Laura Hale, is missing and people around town start dying violent deaths.She set’s out to find out what happened to her friend and why the towns people are dying along with her best friend, Derek Hale who had sworn to never return to Beacon Hills.Join Dani as she navigates the Hellmouth that is Beacon Hills and maybe finds love along the way.

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,975Chapters: 11/16Kudos: 38

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,959Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 34

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: things never said
entry.summary:
Author: dumpac

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,088Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 120

Summary: "Derek, you seem sooo happy to see me.”“Very funny, Stiles.” Derek sounds unamused.Derek wants to be friends with no one, judging by the scowl that has been permanently carved on his face, but everybody wants to be friends with Derek. Because Derek is tall, muscular, criminally handsome, and most importantly he’s a Hale, the oldest werewolf family in this part of California.And Stiles would love to say that he's different, that he’s not like the other boys, but even he had tried to befriend Derek, a long time ago. A long, looong time ago. For who could blame him? Derek Hale is perfect, except for the fact that he’s kind of an asshole.

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,963Chapters: 16/29Kudos: 165

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,497Chapters: 2/15Kudos: 22

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: the boy who cried hunter
entry.summary:
Author: fried_extracrispy_trenchcoat

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,011Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 7

Summary: "Why did you believe me?" Stiles asks later, catching up to Derek outside the police station. He's back to his scowly, bristly self."Because you're right, it was arson. But the police can't prove who did it."I know who it was! Stiles thinks hard at Derek while watching him leave in a sleek black Camaro. But how is he supposed to tell Derek without making himself look totally suspicious? Saying that it’s arson is one thing, but claiming to know who the arsonist is when the whole town was convinced it was nobody's fault?And he had no evidence. While evidence doesn’t always mean truth like Derek said, evidence does get a person places. Case in point: evidence would get a mass murderer like Kate Argent in prison for life.

entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,053Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 78

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: Moonlight Sonata
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,130Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 27

Summary: The cold of the night keeps its secrets, guarding eyes that have never aged, hands that have caressed the impossible.Stiles drifts through cities and shadows, carrying the weight of centuries, solitude etched into his bones, pacts whispered to forces no one dares name.When the Hale pack confronts enemies that twist the very laws they know, his power stirs — offering sanctuary and danger in equal, haunting measure.Amid fractured promises, spilled blood, and the hum of ancient magic, something rises — too fierce to be safe, too wild to be tamed, something that bends rules, time, and the fragile thread of sanity itself.On the razor’s edge between survival and oblivion, they will learn that some forces cannot be commanded… and some desires cannot, will not, be denied.

entry.title: The Recipe for Life
entry.summary:
Author: PeterChristensen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,787Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 83

Summary: Stiles is the engine that runs Doughboy, the chaotic little bakery he built from his late mother’s treasured recipes, but the stress of keeping her memory alive, 16-hour days, 6 days a week, has started to take its toll. To make matters worse, when the town's Chamber of Commerce pressures him into a cooking competition for their latest viral marketing stunt, he’s partnered with the last person he’d ever choose. Derek Hale, the world-traveled trust-fund baby and brooding Gordan Ramsey wannabe.Derek, a professional chef who's still struggling with the recent passing of his sister, is the last living Hale to uphold a world-class culinary legacy. While returning to Beacon Hills, his childhood hometown, he opens his flagship restaurant, Hales, as an honor to the memory of his late family. But now he's stuck with Stiles Stilinski, the hot mess from the Doughboy bakery, who's stuck in the past and refuses to join the present, as a partner in a viral cooking competition that could make or break his new restaurant's success.Sparks fly as flour meets foie gras, and their rivalry in the culinary scene threatens to ignite into something far messier, and far more irresistible, than either expected.

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,398Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 966

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: Fatal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,240Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 10

Summary: His blue eyes were beautiful. Honestly, the most beautiful Stiles had ever seen. He ran his eyes over his body, certain that they were also deadly.He felt unable to move, his feet no longer obeying him. He was staring at Stiles, seeming to wonder why he was still there, standing, admiring him. As much as Stiles wanted to, he would never run away from him. He wanted answers to his questions, and he felt he could get them right then and there.Running away might be impossible. Screaming might bring him a quicker death. Staying, perhaps, for the slightest chance, an attempt to understand who Derek Hale was.Perhaps.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 111,808Chapters: 32/37Kudos: 39

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.
